name: Easy R Software Solution Twitter Feed Integration
author: R Software Solution

sections.description: This is an animated wordpress twitter feed integration plugin. This Plugin will show twitter feed automatically after certain interval. Twitter feed will appear using fade in and fade out effects.
sections.installation:
The quickest method for installing the importer is:

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to use?

You have to define twitter username, Consumer key, Consumer secret key, Access token, Access secret key. You can find these options under plugin setting. After this you can use EASYWPTW shorcode. You can use this shortcode in any of the wordpress pages. If you want to use directly in your php code then you can use do_shortcode() function like .

One another option will be available which is wordpress widget. You can also use Easy WordPress Twitter Feed Integartion widget. Just use this like any other widget.

How to get twitter API?

You can find twitter API detail from here https://apps.twitter.com/ . First of all you have to create an application then you can access these all.

short_description: This plugin will show latest twitter feed from your account with animated effect.
